attributes.action: Introduce legislation to prevent HGV vehicles entering the outside lane of motorway, including on two lane carriageways, and prohibit HGV vehicles overtaking on hills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many instance HGV vehicles overtaking causes long traffic queues and in many instances overtaking HGVs sometimes take substantial risks to pull out around other vehicles.  This will reduce accidents and driver frustration on motorways
